submodules.title: Profile Management
submodules.description: Allows users to create and customize their profiles, including profile pictures, bios, and personal information. Users can manage privacy settings and control who sees their information.

submodules.title: News Feed
submodules.description: Displays a dynamic stream of updates from friends, groups, and pages that users follow. The feed is algorithmically curated to show relevant content based on user interactions and preferences.

submodules.title: Messaging Interface
submodules.description: Provides a seamless chat experience with real-time messaging, multimedia sharing, and group chats. Users can send text, images, videos, and voice messages, as well as create chat groups.

submodules.title: Event Planning
submodules.description: Enables users to create, manage, and RSVP to events. Users can sync events with their calendars, invite friends, and receive reminders for upcoming events.

submodules.title: User Authentication
submodules.description: Handles user registration, login, and secure authentication processes. Implements identity verification through Self Protocol to ensure that users are who they claim to be.

submodules.title: Data Management
submodules.description: Manages user data, including posts, messages, and interactions. Ensures data integrity and security while providing efficient access to user-generated content.

submodules.title: AI Recommendation Engine
submodules.description: Utilizes machine learning algorithms to analyze user behavior and interests, providing personalized recommendations for friends, groups, and content. Continuously learns from user interactions to improve suggestions.

submodules.title: On-Chain Monetization
submodules.description: Facilitates a transparent ad revenue sharing system for creators and advertisers using smart contracts. Ensures that all transactions are secure and verifiable on the blockchain.

submodules.title: Groups and Pages
submodules.description: Allows users to create and join interest-based groups and follow public pages. Facilitates discussions, content sharing, and community engagement around shared interests.

submodules.title: Content Discovery
submodules.description: Enables users to discover new content based on their interests and interactions. Features trending topics, popular posts, and recommendations tailored to individual preferences.

submodules.title: Privacy Controls
submodules.description: Provides users with comprehensive privacy settings to manage who can see their posts, friend requests, and personal information. Users can customize their visibility and control their online presence.

submodules.title: Secure Messaging
submodules.description: Ensures that all messages are encrypted and secure, protecting user conversations from unauthorized access. Implements end-to-end encryption for private chats.

submodules.title: User Engagement Analytics
submodules.description: Tracks user interactions, engagement metrics, and content performance. Provides insights to businesses and creators to help them understand their audience and optimize their strategies.

submodules.title: Ad Performance Tracking
submodules.description: Monitors the effectiveness of advertisements and campaigns, providing detailed reports on reach, engagement, and conversion rates. Helps advertisers refine their targeting and improve ROI.
